body_html:
network.py.txt

  1. please see the python file.
  2. the cluster is set on 2 servers. each one has a ps and a worker. And each worker works on 4 gpu cards.
  3. nothing unusual appears in logs, all logs were print as I coded until it hangs. I do not have stack details right now, but both ps and workers are on locks, and workers still send messages periodically.

please see the python file.
the cluster is set on 2 servers. each one has a ps and a worker. And each worker works on 4 gpu cards.
nothing unusual appears in logs, all logs were print as I coded until it hangs. I do not have stack details right now, but both ps and workers are on locks, and workers still send messages periodically.
body:
[network.py.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/502540/network.py.txt)
1. please see the python file.
2. the cluster is set on 2 servers. each one has a ps and a worker. And each worker works on 4 gpu cards.
3. nothing unusual appears in logs, all logs were print as I coded until it hangs. I do not have stack details right now, but both ps and workers are on locks, and workers still send messages periodically.
